entry.title: The Word Made Flesh
entry.summary: [See post to watch Flash video] The body. Can the body disobey? This is the film I made for my thesis about a lot of things, but in particular, it speaks through art, music and poetry about how the body is interpreted, and hideously misinterpreted, by Western culture. 33 min.
entry.content:
[See post to watch Flash video]

The body. Can the body disobey? This is the film I made for my thesis about a lot of things, but in particular, it speaks through art, music and poetry about how the body is interpreted, and hideously misinterpreted, by Western culture. 33 min.
